EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-3000 Sends reply to the user for inquiry about Markit Securities Finance (MSF).
EmailTemplate.name: MSF Lead Inquiry Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Interest in Markit Securities Finance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your inquiry about Markit Securities Finance (MSF). Your local MSF Account or Sales representative will be in contact with you as soon as possible.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
